data.proxyObjectName: high-back gray upholstered booth seat with metal frame
data.utilizationMethod: Stand beside the booth and use the wide vertical fabric panel as a tall surface; move the tweezers in sweeping up-and-down strokes along the upholstery.

data.proxyObjectName: green-and-white pack of wet wipes with a single white tissue sheet protruding
data.utilizationMethod: Grip the soft plastic pouch near one end between thumb and fingers and knead it forward in squeezing strokes toward the tissue opening

data.proxyObjectName: silver and black Olympus PEN film camera
data.utilizationMethod: Grip the camera body from underneath, rest the index finger on the shutter button, and press the shutter button straight down

data.proxyObjectName: black adjustable tripod stand (microphone or lighting stand)
data.utilizationMethod: Grip the main vertical pole about halfway up, lift the stand so the folded tripod legs cluster above your grip, and swing so those legs serve as the striking head

data.proxyObjectName: long metal flat-head screwdriver with a translucent red handle
data.utilizationMethod: Grip the metal shaft just above the handle between thumb and first two fingers so the handle projects upward and the flat tip points downward, then rotate the shaft between fingertips
Close the tips together, hold the blunt end like a pencil, and glide the closed tips across a surface in controlled strokes

data.proxyObjectName: white plastic adjustable desk lamp with circular head
data.utilizationMethod: Keep the lamp standing; use the flat, weighted base as the contact surface, pressing the screwdriver tip onto its center while rotating

data.proxyObjectName: clear plastic water bottle with screw cap
data.utilizationMethod: Grip the neck of the bottle with your whole hand, hold it sideways so the bottle body sits above the hand, and perform rolling motions
